title: Ocean biogeochemistry in GFDL's Earth System Model 4.1 and its response to increasing atmospheric CO2
journal: Journal of Advances in Modeling Earth Systems
contributionStatement: Member of the core model development team and led the implementation of the carbonate chemistry and chlorofluorocarbon (CFC) tracer routines in the model. Performed benchmark analysis and conducted simulations analyzed in the study. (D=80\% / A=10\% / I=10\% / W=5\%)
